DOC.brief_summary: The objective of the present study is to describe the current practice of postoperative fluid management in the Post Anesthesia Care Unit (PACU) of the Shaare Zedek Medical Center, Jerusalem, Israel.
DOC.brief_title: Fluid Management After Surgery in the Post-Anesthetic Care Unit (PACU)
DOC.detailed_description: The aim of this study is to follow and present the current practice of fluid administration in the PACUof Shaare Zedek Medical Center for an extended period of time as a first step towards establishing guidelines for postoperative fluid management.
DOC.criteria: age > 18 yrs elective surgery ASA IIII massive intraoperative blood loss non elective surgery pregnant women stay in the PACU < 15 minutes
